named-query.name: Restaurante.consultarPorNome
named-query.query: FROM Restaurante WHERE nome LIKE concat('%', :nome, '%') AND cozinha.id = :cozinhaId

named-query.name: Restaurante.existsResponsavel
named-query.query: SELECT case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end FROM Restaurante rest JOIN rest.usuarios resp WHERE rest.id = :restauranteId AND resp.id = :usuarioId
